comments.html: This has got to be the most perfect example problem that would allow me to tie together a bunch of things that I have been wanting to do for a very long time ... Ivan, is there any way that you can post this solution including the EEM script and configuration; I think this could be an invaluable learning example for a lot of us who are still trying to connect the TCL/EEM dots in our Cisco configurations.
comments.name: Bill

comments.html: Will do ... probably not earlier than next year. I just need "a little bit" of time :)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
I tried the script and find some incompatibility with Cisco ASR 1002 with IOS 12.2(33)XNC2.
Following TCL command
snmp_getnext public "cbQosObjectsType"
is answered with next message:
'Could not translate object: cbQosObjectsType into an oid.'
Should I use format like 1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.166.1.1.1.1.4 for oid parameter?
comments.name: Yury McUrin
